text:
Hey everybody it’s Dave and Deb here from
The Planet D

and we’re here in Maui at the beautiful
Fairmont Kea Lani

and we just thought we’d give you a sneak
peek of what this gorgeous resort looks like
And there’s more of the pool here!

We’re here at the Fairmont Kea Lani in Maui
in the ‘deluxe ocean front suite’
Look at that queen sized bed with our flowers

Beautiful, that is one really comfortable
bed, let me tell ya!
Follow me to the bathroom
I’m following you
This is a beautiful bathroom
c’mon over here
This is the entrance way
I really love it
we have our coffee maker and our tea
Ahh I could just sit here
put my cheese and wine right there
and enjoy a night just hanging out in my room
it’s gorgeous

This is the pièce de résistance
sunglasses must go on now!
come on out to our balcony

this is just incredible, we’re overlooking
the pool
and there we go the ocean’s right there
Just a spectacular destination!

So how about we go and show you how close
we are to the beach
just walking through the nice little cabanas

we all get these great little cabana chairs
to lay in the sun

So what I love about about this whole section
of Wailea is that there is a two and a half

mile walkway that you can take all around
to the different resorts

So if you need something to do or if you want
to go for a jog in the morning or anything

like that
you don’t want to do it on the beach you
can do it on the pathway pretty convenient if you ask me!

So if you do come to Maui I highly recommend
the Suites

Yes Dave is here with me
Me too, me too
I highly recommend it as well!
Great tour Deb!
Ciao!
